Melee attacks can quickly deliver high damage.
They are also your only option once out of ammo.

Hold Ａ button while HUD displays 'MELEE RANGE'
to switch to melee combat.

Doing so will perform automatic lock-on.
You will not be able to use sub-weapons.

Hold Ａ button and swing wiimote vertically 
to attack from above.
Hold Ａ button and swing wiimote horizontally 
to perform wide slash.

If you keep swinging wiimote, a 3-hit combo 
will be performed automatically.

Enemies will, obviously, counter attack. 
Hold Ａ and Ｂ buttons at same time to block. 
against melee attacks.

Melee guard（Ａ+Ｂ）cannot be held indefinitely. 
Continous attacks will break it.

If your Guard meter (lower right corner) is full, 
your Guard will break as well.

Melee combat oriented Mobile suits will have
more resilient Guard.

Before you is an enemy constantly Guarding. 
Try to break their Guard with continous attacks.

If yours and enemy's weapons collide, 
a Clash will occur. 
Keep swinging wiimote to win the duel.

Continue swinging to fill the meter. 
If you win the duel, a special attack 
will be performed.

During Guard（Ａ+Ｂ）swing wiimote at perfect 
moment to perform a parry.
If you succeed, a counter attack will occur.

If you fail, you'll receive damage. 
If you succed, you will perform counter attack. 
Practice to get hang of it.
Guard break will not increase now, so keep trying.

You can now perform all attacks, including ranged fire. 
Use what you have learned to defeat the instructor.
